prior.step: Ramp/apron clear of FOD, ice, snow or spills
All non-essential staff behind ERA; wing-walkers assigned when required
Interphone link with flight deck established; marshalling-only backup agreed
If ASU needed, brief crew on hose side and engine-start sequence
Brake-system pressure within limits; essential electrical buses energised

checklist.step: GSE and passenger stairs detached; stand clear of obstructions
Adequate clearance from fixed obstacles along aircraft path
All servicing panels/hatches closed and secured (except external power/headset)
Cabin and cargo-door handles flush; no visible damage or leaks
Landing-gear safety pins removed; tyres and struts serviceable
Confirm aircraft parking brake SET via interphone
Verify tow-tractor secured to nose-gear
Remove main-gear chocks on command; leave others until departure
Ensure personnel clear of danger zones; ASU positioned opposite start engine
Coordinate engine-start sequence with flight crew; supply air on request
Transmit "Ramp clear – ready for push" and await cockpit acknowledgement

pre_departure.second_message: Do you need more time to complete this step?

prior.step: Brake-accumulator pressure ≥ minimum; anti-collision beacon ON
Nose and main-gear ground-lock pins fitted; do not tow if NLG shock > 11.5 in / gauge inserts freely
Gear safety pins installed unless immediate flight pushback
Qualified brake operator on flight deck; interphone tested and clear
Tractor driver briefed: max 5 km h during push; steering-angle limits

checklist.step: Set aircraft parking brake and confirm interphone connection
Insert bypass pin; connect tow-bar (aircraft end first) or engage tow-bar-less tractor
If TL-tractor, ensure main-gear symmetrically chocked before lift
Energise aircraft bus bars; BEACON + NAV lights ON; verify brake pressure available
Remove all remaining chocks when instructed; confirm "Chocks removed"
Re-confirm interphone clarity; standard phraseology only ("STOP PUSHBACK" for emergency)

pushback_prep.second_message: Do you need more time to complete this step?

prior.step: Tug aligned on centre-line; tow-bar wheels raised; observers at wing-tips/tail
All crew briefed on speed ≤ 5 mph and 50 m stop rule

checklist.step: Start roll – tug moves straight ≤ 5 mph, smooth braking
Manoeuvre – obey wing-walker signals; stay within steering-angle limits; avoid tyre scrubbing
Comms – headset announces "Pushback starting"; maintain continuous interphone
Pull-forward (if required) – final metres straight to unload nose-gear torsion
Stop – tug brakes ON; headset: "BRAKES SET"; flight crew sets aircraft parking brake

pushback_pull_forward.second_message: Do you need more time to complete this step?

prior.step: Aircraft parking brake SET; main-gear chocks in place; tractor brake set
Tower or ground control advised "Towing completed" as required

checklist.step: Tractor driver sets parking brake; requests aircraft brake-set
Brake operator sets aircraft parking brake, checks pressure; reports "PARKING BRAKE SET – PRESSURE CHECKED"
Ground crew chock main landing-gear; switch off external & anti-collision lights; report "AIRCRAFT CHOCKED"
Disconnect tow-bar / TL-tractor and remove bypass pin after permission; report "TOWBAR/TRACTOR DISCONNECTED"
Brake operator releases parking brake once stabilised; confirm "PARKING BRAKE OFF – AIRCRAFT STABILIZED"
GPU re-connected or tug GPU shut down as directed
Remove and stow all gear-safety pins; tow team clears ERA

towing_completion.second_message: Do you need more time to complete this step?
